INSERT INTO d06_pay_order( order_no, user_id, nick, user_phone, order_price, pay_type, trade_no, order_status, buy_msg, shipping_name, shipping_phone, province, city, area, invoice_flag, invoice_type, invoice_content, invoice_title, shipping_address, create_time, delete_flag, pay_time, end_time ) VALUES
( #{d06PayOrder.orderNo}, #{d06PayOrder.userId}, #{d06PayOrder.nick}, #{d06PayOrder.userPhone}, #{d06PayOrder.orderPrice}, #{d06PayOrder.payType}, #{d06PayOrder.tradeNo}, #{d06PayOrder.orderStatus}, #{d06PayOrder.buyMsg}, #{d06PayOrder.shippingName}, #{d06PayOrder.shippingPhone}, #{d06PayOrder.province}, #{d06PayOrder.city}, #{d06PayOrder.area}, #{d06PayOrder.invoiceFlag}, #{d06PayOrder.invoiceType}, #{d06PayOrder.invoiceContent}, #{d06PayOrder.invoiceTitle}, #{d06PayOrder.shippingAddress}, #{d06PayOrder.createTime}, #{d06PayOrder.delete_flag}, #{d06PayOrder.payTime}, #{d06PayOrder.endTime} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE d06_pay_order
order_no = #{orderNo}, user_id = #{userId}, nick = #{nick}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, order_price = #{orderPrice}, pay_type = #{payType}, trade_no = #{tradeNo}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, buy_msg = #{buyMsg}, shipping_name = #{shippingName}, shipping_phone = #{shippingPhone}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, area = #{area}, invoice_flag = #{invoiceFlag}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType}, invoice_content = #{invoiceContent}, invoice_title = #{invoiceTitle}, shipping_address = #{shippingAddress}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag}, create_time = #{createTime}, pay_time = #{payTime}, end_time = #{endTime},
WHERE id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT order_status AS id, count(*) AS num FROM d06_pay_order WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY order_status;
